title: Can we talk about how bad the new ping wheel is
body:
They changed it and now it's seriously bad. You can't ping in quick succession because there is a small delay toit and I think throughout the entirety of all the games I played today I didn't hit the right ping once.

Plus it's tiny. It feels really bad to use.

Please tell me I'm not alone with this

replies.body: It's horrible, can't stand using it :/ upvoted
that's why I've just memorized what means what and G+Direction on mouse. Ping wheel sucks
I do that too but it's still different from before
Yea, there's like a .5s delay. Which sucks cuz that's .5s from doing something else important.
change the ping to a hotkey and spam the key. for example my missing enemy ping is a period and i just spam that shit every game
i dont like it because for some reason i press g to try to ping something but the cursor flies some other direction and wont let me ping what i want till i press g several times. some kind of bug
o they changed it? i thought i fucked something about my mouse up lol

I hate that so much i overwrote some of my casts just so they can be used as pings now. My laugh is on Y now and Ctrl+4 is the new Missing Enemy Ping.

i never liked pingwheel to begin with, but now they just made it worse than it was.
They should keep an 'option' so we can choose if we want 'big' or 'small' cause I don't have a problem with its size on my pc but I know that it would be a problem for someone on a laptop
It'll probably just take some time to get use to, remember when people said the new HUD looked bad?
Just tested, I am not having any problems with it.

Try pinging faster then

There is a short delay that wasn't there before and if you know exactly how it felt before this just feels bad in comparison
I was pinging as fast as I would ever need to, as fast as I could without really trying. I didn't notice much of a difference.
I have the same problem too and I'm trying to find a way to fix it cause it's so annoying and so small that I can't even hit the right ping.
They changed it with this patch.. I hope they revert it
